title: Crayola Crayon Classpack, 800 Count, Bulk School Supplies For Teachers, Large Crayon Box, 8 Colors
description: Stock up on Crayola Crayons for the whole classroom to share! This 800ct Bulk Crayons set features 8 assorted colors including: Black, Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, and Brown. With 100 crayons in each color, this box is perfect for DIY crafts, arts and crafts projects, and homework assignments all year long. Double wrapped for long lasting durability, Crayola Class Pack Crayons are sturdy enough to be used by little hands over and over again. When the fun is done, simply return each crayon to the organized and reusable storage box for breezy cleanup. Pair with Crayola Construction Paper for the ultimate coloring set! Safe and nontoxic, ideal for children ages 5 and up.
